title-group.article-title: Brake Tubing Corrosion—Its Causes, Effects, and Commercially Acceptable Elimination

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc., 1977

abstract.p: Seamless 90/10 copper-nickel brake tubing has been introduced in the European market for both original equipment and replacement applications on automobiles and trucks. It offers a significant advantage over other materials in terms of its combination of corrosion resistance, strength and formability at a price which is not prohibitive.
